title: Chili Garlic Pappardelle with Smashed Broccoli and Soft Eggs Recipe - Pinch of Yum
description: Slippery, spicy pappardelle with a quick sauce, topped with a pile of roasty smashed broccoli and a perfectly messy soft egg. Yes, please.
author: Lindsay
og_title: Chili Garlic Pappardelle with Smashed Broccoli and Soft Eggs
og_description: Slippery, spicy, bossy noodles with a minimal-ingredient sauce, topped with a pile of roasty smashed broccoli and a perfectly messy soft egg. Yes, please.
